cutter.name: Battle Born
cutter.info: You may expend your special armor to reduce harm from an attack in combat or to push yourself during a fight.

cutter.name: Bodyguard
cutter.info: When you protect a teammate, take +1d to your resistance roll. When you gather info to anticipate possible threats in the current situation, you get +1 effect.

cutter.name: Ghost Fighter
cutter.info: You may imbue your hands, melee weapons, or tools with spirit energy. You gain potencyin combat vs. the supernatural. You may grapple with spirits to restrain and capture them.

cutter.name: Leader
cutter.info: When you command a cohort in combat, they continue to fight when they would otherwise break (they’re not taken out when they suffer level 3 harm). They gain +1 effect and 1 armor.

cutter.name: Mule
cutter.info: Your load limits are higher. Light: 5. Normal: 7. Heavy: 8.

cutter.name: Not to be trifled with
cutter.info: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of physical strength that verges on the superhuman一engage a small gang on equal footing in close combat.

cutter.name: Savage
cutter.info: When you unleash physical violence, it’s especially frightening. When you command a frightened target, take +1d.

cutter.name: Vigorous
cutter.info: You recover from harm faster. Permanently fill in one of your healing clock segments. Take +1d to healing treatment rolls.

cutter.name: Veteran
cutter.info: Choose a special ability from another source.

leech.name: Alchemist
leech.info: When you inventor craft a creation with alchemical features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special formula already known.

leech.name: Analyst
leech.info: During downtime, you get two ticks to distribute among any long term project clocks that involve investigation or learning a new formula or design plan.

leech.name: Artificer
leech.info: When you invent or craft a creation with spark-craft features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special design already known.

leech.name: Fortitude
leech.info: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of fatigue, weakness, or chemical effects, or to push yourself when working with technical skill or handling alchemicals.

leech.name: Ghost ward
leech.info: You know how to wreck an area with arcane substances and methods so it is either anathema or enticing to spirits (your choice).

leech.name: Physicker
leech.info: You can tinker with bones, blood, and bodily humours to treat wounds or stabilize the dying. You may study a malady or a corpse. Everyone in your crew gets +1d to their healing treatment rolls.

leech.name: Saboteur
leech.info: When you wreck, the work is much quieter than it should be and the damage is hidden from casual inspection.

leech.name: Venomous
leech.info: Choose a drug or poison (from your bandolier stock) to which you have become immune. You can push yourself to secrete it through your skin or saliva or exhale it as a vapor.

leech.name: Veteran
leech.info: Choose a special ability from another source.

whisper.name: Compel
whisper.info: You can attune to the ghost field to force a nearby ghost to appear and obey a command you give it. You are not supernaturally terrified by a ghost you summon or compel  (though your allies may be).

whisper.name: Ghost Mind
whisper.info: You are always aware of supernatural entities in your presence. Take +1d when you gather info about the supernatural.

whisper.name: Iron Will
whisper.info: You're immune to the terror that supernatural entities inflict on sight. Take +1d to resistance rolls with resolve.

whisper.name: Occultist
whisper.info: You know the secret ways to consort with ancient powers, forgotten gods or demons. Once you’ve consorted with one, you get +1d to command cultists who worship it.

whisper.name: Ritual
whisper.info: You can study an occult ritual (or create a new one) to summon a supernatural effect or being. You know the arcane methods to perform ritual sorcery. You begin with one ritual already learned.

whisper.name: Strange Methods
whisper.info: When you invent or craft a creation with arcane features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one arcane design already known.

whisper.name: Tempest
whisper.info: You can push yourself to do one of the following: unleash a stroke of lightning as a weaponーsummon a storm in your immediate vicinity (torrential rain, roaring winds, heavy fog, chilling frost/snow, etc.).

whisper.name: Warded
whisper.info: You may expend your special armor to resist supernatural consequences, or to push yourself when you deal with arcane forces.

whisper.name: Veteran
whisper.info: Choose a special ability from another source.

hound.name: Sharpshooter
hound.info: You can push yourself to do one of the following: make a ranged attack at extreme distance beyond what’s normal for the weapon—unleash a barrage of rapid fire to suppress the enemy.

hound.name: Focused
hound.info: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of surprise or mental harm (fear, confusion, losing track of someone) or to push yourself for ranged combat or tracking.

hound.name: Ghost Hunter
hound.info: Your hunting pet is imbued with spirit energy. It gains potency when tracking or fighting the supernatural, and gains an arcane ability: ghost-form, mind-link, or arrow-swift. Take this ability again to choose an additional arcane ability for your pet.

hound.name: Scout
hound.info: When you gather info to locate a target, you get +1 effect. When you hide in a prepared position or use camouflage, you get +1d to rolls to avoid detection.

hound.name: Surivor
hound.info: From hard won experience or occult ritual, you are immune to the poisonous miasma of the deathlands and are able to subsist on the strange flora and fauna there. You get +1 stress box.

hound.name: Tough as Nails
hound.info: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal).

hound.name: Vengeful
hound.info: You gain an additional xp trigger: You got payback against someone who harmed you or someone you care about. If your crew helped you get payback, also mark crew xp.

hound.name: Veteran
hound.info: Choose a special ability from another source.
